Description.description: The description of the Data Table.
Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the Data Table.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 250  
Pattern: ^[\P{C}
	]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Timestamp.description: A epoch time stamp field used for data table operations.
Timestamp.markdownDescription:
A epoch time stamp field used for data table operations.

---

Required: No  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: Replacement
